coffee-makers.name: Bonavita BV1900TS 8-Cup Carafe Coffee Brewer, Stainless Steel
coffee-makers.description: This is a simple and efficient Espresso Machine coffee maker made of stainless steel, that features an automatic Shut-Off and a pre-infusion mode that soaks the ground coffee before brewing, ensuring an even extraction.
features: One-touch brew operation with auto-off , Dishwasher safe; All plastic is BPA-free
Powerful and precise 1500-watt heater maintains optimal brewing temperature of 195 Degree-205 DegreeF (91 Degree-96 DegreeC)
Optional pre-infusion mode wets freshly roasted ground coffee to allow degassing before brewing
Flat-bottomed filter basket and larger showerhead allow for even better saturation and uniform extraction.Durable stainless steel lined thermal carafe

coffee-makers.name: Cuisinart DCC-3200P1 Perfectemp Coffee Maker, 14 Cup Progammable with Glass Carafe
coffee-makers.description: This coffee maker is a 14-cup programmable machine that comes with a glass carafe and a hot water dispenser. It features a large backlit LCD display, a brew strength control that lets you choose between regular or bold coffee, and an adjustable auto-shutoff.
features: 14-Cup glass carafe with a stainless steel handle
Fully automatic with 24-hour programmability, self-clean, 1-4 cup setting, and auto shutoff (0-4 hours)
Brew strength control - select BOLD for stronger coffee flavor
State-of-the-art technology to ensure hotter coffee without sacrificing flavor or quality

coffee-makers.name: Breville BDC650BSS Grind Control Coffee Maker
coffee-makers.description: The Breville BDC650BSS Grind Control Coffee Maker is a programmable coffee maker with an integrated conical burr grinder. It features 12 strength settings, a backlit LCD display, and a hot water dispenser.

Programmable with auto start, auto shutoff, and auto grind
Backlit LCD display with grind size and grind time dials
Hot water dispenser for tea and hot cocoa

coffee-makers.name: Technivorm Moccamaster 59162 KB Coffee Maker
coffee-makers.description: The Technivorm Moccamaster 59162 KB Coffee Maker is a 10-cup coffee maker that features a stainless steel construction and a copper boiling element for efficient and consistent heating. It has a brew-through lid and a hot plate to keep your coffee warm.
features: 10-cup coffee maker with stainless steel construction
Copper boiling element for efficient and consistent heating
Brew-through lid and hot plate to keep your coffee warm
Designed and manufactured in the Netherlands with a 5-year warranty

coffee-makers.name: Chemex Classic Series, Pour-Over Glass Coffeemaker
coffee-makers.description: The Chemex Classic Series is a pour-over glass coffee maker that is made of non-porous Borosilicate glass. It features a wood collar with leather tie and can make up to 8 cups of coffee.

Makes up to 8 cups of coffee

coffee-makers.name: Breville Bambino Plus Automatic Espresso Machine, Black Truffle
coffee-makers.description: The Bambino Plus doesn't compromise on the 4 key elements of cafe quality coffee. Delivering barista quality performance using a 54mm portafilter with 19 grams for full flavour and automatic milk texturing. With a 3 second heat up time and precise espresso extraction, you go from bean to cup, faster than ever before. Just like your local cafe.
features: Automatic Microfoam Milk Texturing. The automatic steam wand allows you to adjust the milk temperature and texture to suit your taste. Delivering barista quality micro-foam that enhances the flavour of the coffee and is essential for creating latte art.
Faster heat up time. Innovative ThermoJet heating system achieves the optimum extraction temperature in 3 seconds. Ready to make your best coffee without the wait.

19 grams dose for full flavour. Achieve a consistent and balanced espresso using the right amount of ground coffee. The 54mm porta-filter with 19 grams is the key for full flavour and cafe quality coffee.
Low pressure pre-infusion. Low pressure pre-infusion gradually increases pressure at the start and helps ensure all the flavours are drawn out evenly during the extraction for a balanced tasting cup.
Precise espresso extraction. Digital temperature control (PID) delivers water at precisely the right temperature, ensuring optimal espresso extraction.
Water Tank Capacity: 1.9 L (64 fl oz)
Heat Up Time: 3 seconds
Programmable shot volume, adjustable milk froth texture (3 levels), adjustable milk temperature (3 levels), steam button
